slides.title: What are Current Affairs?
slides.content:
**Current Affairs:** Recent events and developments in India and the world

**Categories:**
- National Affairs
- International Affairs
- Sports
- Awards & Honors
- Science & Technology
- Economy & Business

slides.title: How to Prepare
slides.content:
**1. Read Daily Newspapers:**
- Focus on national dailies
- Note important events

**2. Follow News Websites:**
- Government portals
- Reliable news sources

**3. Monthly Current Affairs:**
- Compile important events
- Make notes

**4. Focus Areas:**
- Government schemes
- International summits
- Sports achievements
- Major appointments

slides.title: Key Topics to Track
slides.content:
**National:**
- New government policies
- Budget announcements
- State elections
- Supreme Court judgments

**International:**
- India's foreign relations
- Global summits (G20, BRICS)
- International organizations (UN, WHO)

**Others:**
- Nobel Prizes
- Bharat Ratna & Padma Awards
- Olympic/Asian Games
